last_episode_to_air.name: Stalked by a Vampire
last_episode_to_air.overview: A family is attacked by an inhuman creature that drains them of their energy. When they decide to move out, to try to escape whatever is tormenting them, they are shocked to discover that the evil entity has followed them to their new home.

name: The Haunted
overview: The Haunted is an American paranormal television series that premiered on November 22, 2009 on Animal Planet. Produced by Picture Shack Entertainment, the program features ghost stories and paranormal investigations involving animals. It also incorporates actual footage and photographs from the famiilies and paranormal research teams involved.

episodes.name: Lost Souls of the Asylum
episodes.overview: Two computer company owners begin hearing unexplainable sounds, seeing shadow figures, and finding out their location seems to be haunted by spirits of tortured souls. Later, sounds of monkeys screeching terrorize a candle shop and it's owners.

episodes.name: Murder at the Black Horse
episodes.overview: A family purchases an old building that was rumored to be haunted and find out a notorious gangster was murdered in the basement. Later, a family witnesses several frightening events that make them take a closer look at their home.

episodes.name: The Ghost Box Prophecies
episodes.overview: A group of friends decide to take up ghost hunting as a hobby and visit an infamous abandoned hospital. Back at home, the family's house and their animals behavior has changed drastically.

episodes.name: Terror at Maple Dale Farm
episodes.overview: Family is terrorized by a malicious presence that wreaked havoc on the well-being of their animals and an unidentified creature is frightening them in their barn.

episodes.name: Demon House
episodes.overview: A couple has been waging a ceaseless war against the unseen forces occupying their two hundred year old home.

episodes.name: The Possession of Cassie
episodes.overview: Upon moving into their new home, a single mother and her two kids become perplexed when their dogs begin to act up â€” barking and growling at seemingly nothing. But it isn't until they start hearing rumors around town that they bought a haunted house that they really take notice. Then one night, one of the girls is attacked by an unseen presence and is scratched on her face and her back. When the family calls in a paranormal team and one of their members is attacked in the same room as the girl, the family runs from the home. After several weeks away, and with nowhere else to go, the family is forced to move back in the home and face their worst fears.

episodes.name: Leave House
episodes.overview: A family and their dogs are being frightened by something in their house - the spirit of someone who may have once lived in their home.

episodes.name: Lady in White
episodes.overview: Animals of a family's house guests begin reacting to something no one could see. It wasn't long before the humans began seeing what the animals were seeing - the ghost of a woman who once lived near the house!

episodes.name: The Door
episodes.overview: A family's excitement over their new house quickly fades when they are terrorized by an unseen entity determined to run them out. Not far, another family lives in fear that paranormal activity is killing all the animals on their farm.

episodes.name: Leave Now or Die
episodes.overview: When a couple find horrifying words spray-painted on their house, they brush it off as a prank. After hearing animal-like growls, they call in a paranormal team to help. Later, a family moves into a hotel only to discover the previous occupants never left

episodes.name: The Demonic Seduction
episodes.overview: A paranormal researcher is seduced and then repeatedly attacked by a female demonic entity known as a Succubus. After calling on a demonologist for help,the researcher's wife battles with the Succubus who has possessed and is trying to steal her husband.

episodes.name: Demon Attack
episodes.overview: A young girl describes a vision of a bloody girl and a car crash and her mother begins to suspect her daughter can see spirits of dead people. Her suspicions are confirmed by a paranormal group after her daughter attracts something demonic into the home.

episodes.name: The Bloody Man
episodes.overview: After a woman's daughter sees an unknown figure in the bathroom and her son tells her about a bloody man he saw in the basement, she and her husband become extremely uneasy and fear that their house is haunted.

episodes.name: Killer from the Grave
episodes.overview: Terror takes hold of a family who moves into a new home with no knowledge of the horrors that have taken place there. With nowhere to turn, the family invites paranormal researchers to investigate their home. What they discover is truly shocking.

episodes.name: Horror in the Closet
episodes.overview:
Growing up in his house, Andrew never told a soul about the spirit who was driving him mad. He didn't want people to think he was crazy. What he didn't know was that his mother was also having horrifying encounters with the same ghost. It isn't until a paranormal team investigates their case that the home's gruesome past is uncovered.

Then, a paranormal team encounters an unexplainable evil entity in the house of a young homeowner and the evidence they gather is truly astonishing; shadow figures, orbs they claim are manifestations of spirits, and the most horrifying of all, a recorded voice from the dead telling them to die. (Investigations performed by the Lights Out Paranormal Research Team and QUEST Paranormal Society.)

episodes.name: Land of Misery
episodes.overview: PJ had a bad feeling about the old plantation she and her family moved into from the very beginning. But when PJ's horses and dogs started to fall ill and the family's luck grew worse and worse, her fears were confirmed. Her animals' tragic, inexplicable illnesses and her own mysterious health problems led PJ to believe something paranormal was going on. When she discovered that the land on which the plantation sat was a cursed Native American battleground, the family sought the help of Native American paranormal investigators and a Medicine Man to put the warring spirits to rest. (Investigation performed by the Native American Ghost Society.)

episodes.name: The Touch of Death
episodes.overview: Jennifer thought she and her dogs had found a happy ending when she fell in love with and married her landlord, Mike. But before long, they began to wonder if something was amiss in their century-old apartment building nestled in the mountains of Saranac Lake, NY. The dogs, Jasmine and Lily, were being tormented by something the couple couldn't see. When Jennifer and Mike started to be terrorized by a shadow figure, they looked into the history of their home and discovered that it was a cure cottage to tuberculosis patients in the 1900s. (Investigation performed by the Ohio Researchers for Banded Spirits.)

episodes.name: Dead in the Water
episodes.overview: Jenny thought her new home would be a great place to raise her son Andrew. However, when Andrew started to talk to "Georgie," a little boy her son said had drowned in the nearby pond, Jenny became concerned. So she called in a local paranormal team to help her uncover the truth about what was bothering her animals and her family. The team's efforts to solve the mystery of "Georgie" would uncover a long buried family secret. Debbie and her animals began to notice unusual activity in her home after the sudden disappearance of her mysterious roommate. As the activity escalated, Debbie called on her cousin, John Zaffis, a renowned demonologist. John is eventually convinced that a curse has been placed on Debbie and her home. With the help of a priest and a psychic, John and Debbie succeed in exorcising the evil spirits summoned by the curse. (Investigation performed by the Chippewa Valley Paranormal Investigators.)

episodes.name: House of the Rising Dead
episodes.overview: After Hurricane Katrina, Karla returned to New Orleans and bought an old mansion for her and her extended family to call home. As the family worked to repair the historic property, they were frightened by what appeared to be unexplained paranormal activity. Through the help of local paranormal investigators, Karla discovered that the mansion had once been the home of a religious organization that was rumored to sacrifice animals. With the help of demonologist, Carl Johnson, and psychic-medium, Chris Fleming, Karla wages spiritual warfare to rid the house of the entities in the home. (Investigation performed by the New Orleans Paranormal and Occult Society.)

episodes.name: Invasion of the Poltergeist
episodes.overview:
Kim and her family lived a seemingly normal life in their suburban home. However, in a matter of months, Kim's life went straight to hell as she and her children were menaced by a dark, shadowy presence. Kim was concerned that the attacks were related to a recently deceased relative who was a master of the occult. Scared that something wanted to harm them, Kim reached out to investigators who specialized in demonic hauntings. Believing the family's story, the team had a priest visit the home to perform an exorcism.

Sharan and her husband, Gus, tried to ignore the strange activity in their new home. Their animals would react to a presence they could not see. Strangest of all, they would return to their locked house and find furniture and objects moved around and piled up. When the entity started to mess with her children, Sharan contacted a paranormal team. The team recorded evidence that the family was being victimized by a poltergeist. With the help of a psychic, the team cleansed the home of the entity so the family could feel safe once again. (Investigations performed by the The Pennsylvania Paranormal Association.)

episodes.name: Monster in the Closet
episodes.overview: After having unusual experiences in their home, a family calls upon a paranormal team and demonologist to help. When they try to banish the entity from the home, it violently possesses one of the family members, and literally enters her body.

episodes.name: You Must Die Tonight
episodes.overview: Things escalate for a family who hear unexplained growls and voices in their home. After calling in a local paranormal team, the gruesome history of a grizzly murder is uncovered which might provide an explanation for the negatativity in the home.

episodes.name: Bone Crusher
episodes.overview: Melissa and her family were at a loss to explain the strange activity in their home, until she uncovered a shocking discovery buried beneath her backyard.

episodes.name: Don't Go in the Attic
episodes.overview: A family begins to fear that their home may be inhabited by a resident from its long and storied past. Once they call in a paranormal team, their worst fears are confirmed - their home is indeed haunted, by multiple spirits, who refuse to leave.

episodes.name: Stalked by a Vampire
episodes.overview: A family is attacked by an inhuman creature that drains them of their energy. When they decide to move out, to try to escape whatever is tormenting them, they are shocked to discover that the evil entity has followed them to their new home.

episodes.name: Murder in Room 12
episodes.overview: Employees of an Inn begin reporting odd activity - especially around Room 12. Concerned, the owners call in a paranormal team to investigate the Inn and help them uncover the mystery of Room 12.

episodes.name: The Touch of Death
episodes.overview: Jennifer thought she and her dogs had found a happy ending when she fell in love with and married her landlord, Mike. But before long, they began to wonder if something was amiss in their century-old apartment building nestled in the mountains of Saranac Lake, NY. The dogs, Jasmine and Lily, were being tormented by something the couple couldn't see. When Jennifer and Mike started to be terrorized by a shadow figure, they looked into the history of their home and discovered that it was a cure cottage to tuberculosis patients in the 1900s. (Investigation performed by the Ohio Researchers for Banded Spirits.)

episodes.name: House of the Rising Dead
episodes.overview: After Hurricane Katrina, Karla returned to New Orleans and bought an old mansion for her and her extended family to call home. As the family worked to repair the historic property, they were frightened by what appeared to be unexplained paranormal activity. Through the help of local paranormal investigators, Karla discovered that the mansion had once been the home of a religious organization that was rumored to sacrifice animals. With the help of demonologist, Carl Johnson, and psychic-medium, Chris Fleming, Karla wages spiritual warfare to rid the house of the entities in the home. (Investigation performed by the New Orleans Paranormal and Occult Society.)
